contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox city Japan |Name= Kotake |JapaneseName= 小竹町 |settlement_type= Town |MapImage= Kotake in Fukuoka Prefecture Ja.svg |Region= [[Kyūshū]] |Prefecture= [[Fukuoka Prefecture|Fukuoka]] |District= [[Kurate District, Fukuoka|Kurate District]] |Area_km2= 14.18 |PopDate= 2003 |Population= 9,492 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees = 33 |LatitudeMinutes = 42 |LatitudeSeconds = |LongtitudeDegrees = 130 |LongtitudeMinutes = 43 |LongtitudeSeconds = |Tree=4 dtgdg |Flower= |Bird= 44r |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= n-kotake.nik-net.co.jp/ Town of Kotake] }} [[Image:Kotake Town office.jpg|thumb|Kotake Town Office]] {{nihongo|'''Kotake'''|小竹町|Kotake-machi}} is a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Kurate District, Fukuoka|Kurate District]], [[Fukuoka Prefecture|Fukuoka]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 9,492 and a [[population density|density]] of 669.39 persons per km². The total area is 14.18 km². ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} *[http://town-kotake.nik-net.co.jp/ Kotake official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Towns in Fukuoka Prefecture]] {{Fukuoka-geo-stub}}
